title: Titchikha Hillfort
description: Fortified site associated with the Saltov-Mayatskaya culture (8th-10th centuries CE) located northwest of the modern village of Titchikha, Voronezh Oblast'. Remains dated to the Scythian period have also been found in the vicinity of the site.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Titchikha Gorodishche site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of городище "Титчиха" (8-10 вв)
